I first met you in a time when I was content being just me. Single, independent ‚Äì I was invincible. I am complete. Years of youth‚Äôs fears are over now‚Ä¶ I grew up I guess and I felt noone can hurt me .. not anymore.

So I convinced myself your not that pretty, but seeing your smile seems to make me doubt everytime. Anyway, you‚Äôre Frans‚Äô friend, ‚Äúnde katalo‚Äù, I said to myself. But I know for some reason‚Ä¶ someday .. you will mean much more to me than I can ever hope for.

Years passed by, I felt the world closing in on me. I lost all that confidence. Home is not what it used to be, work is hell. Everything‚Äôs a mess‚Ä¶ independence has never been so painful. I joined the walking dead, alive but not living. Everyday the same old things, the same problems, same places,same people and same pain. I felt the routine a spiral, to where, I dont know. I was looking forward to the end of it.

Then, out of God‚Äôs good grace, I bumped into you again. All the feelings I hid from you, once upon a time, came rushing, like a river bashing into a dam after a summer downpour. I invited you to a movie and dinner. We spent some time as friends and I was very happy. Those times came more often‚Ä¶ more and more i spend with you.. I felt the load on my chest lighten . Even in July the sun seems to shine ‚Äì brighter even. I knew then that Im falling for you. And I made you feel that the only way i know, in words.

I want you to know that, You turned my life around, when you finally said those three words. I was so happy and happier still every day.

I can never go wrong again, because for once in my life I am truly .. complete.

I love you my Angel!
